doc:
Angus L. Bowmer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angus_L._Bowmer 0 Angus L. Bowmer (September 25, 1904 – May 26, 1979) was the founder of the Oregon Shakespeare Festival in Ashland, Oregon, United States. During his tenure as artistic director, he produced all 37 of William Shakespeare's plays and performed 32 Shakespearean roles in 43 separate stagings. Angus_L._Bowmer ( September_25_,_1904 – May_26_,_1979 ) was the_founder of the_Oregon_Shakespeare_Festival in Ashland , Oregon , United_States . During his_tenure as artistic_director , he produced all_37 of William_Shakespeare 's_plays and performed 32_Shakespearean_roles in 43_separate_stagings .
